# WynkWash - Premium Doorstep Car Wash in Bengaluru

WynkWash is Bengaluru's #1 doorstep car wash service provider, specializing in professional vehicle cleaning at your home or office.

## Services
- Premium Doorstep Wash: Exterior wash, pressure cleaning, and tire polishing.
- Interior Deep Cleaning: Vacuuming, upholstery scrubbing, and sanitization.
- Exterior Rubbing & Waxing: Scratch removal and high-gloss finish.
- Complete Car Spa: Full interior and exterior detailing.
- Monthly Maintenance Plans: Recurring weekly or monthly doorstep washes.

## Service Areas (Bengaluru West)
- Laggere
- Rajajinagar
- Malleshwaram
- Basaveshwaranagar
- Vijayanagar

## Contact Information
- Website: https://wynkwash.vercel.app
- Phone: +91 88700 37600
- Location: Kapila Nagar, Laggere, Bengaluru, KA 560058
- Booking: Instant booking available via WhatsApp.

## Why Choose Us?
- Eco-friendly cleaning products.
- Professional team with high-end equipment.
- No need to drive to a car wash; we come to you.
- Reliable and transparent pricing.
